Description: Normal 0 false false false EN-US JA X-NONE Stellar Mercury 001 Elite - Green Emerald Flametop, Singlecut Electric Guitar The Factory Direct Music difference Manufacturer direct savings 30-Day money back guarantee 5-year warranty We love our customers! All guitars are professionally setup in-house prior to shipping by our resident guitar luthier who brings his knowledge from his time working as a PRS neck-specialist in Maryland to your guitar today Florida-based family-owned musical instrument distributor, since 2001 Condition and Comments · There is a small ding on the backside of the body of this guitar, as well as what appears to be a dark spot in the stain near the bottom tuning knob. Besides those cosmetic issues the guitar is in amazing condition. This emerald stained Stellar Guitar is really a crown jewel! The guitar comes made out of a thick flametop maple cap (NOT a veneer!) and mahogany body. The neck is also a mahogany set neck. It also has a dark rosewood fretboard. The flame maple top, as well as the body is stained with a vibrant looking green, which makes this guitar look as beautiful as an emerald itself (hence the name!). The fretboard is rich and dark which also gives an excellent contrast to the shine of the highly detailed pearloid inlays. This guitar has two Stellar OSR humbucker pickups. These pickups give the guitar long sustains that sound excellent with a classic tone that is exactly what you would expect from this kind of guitar. The D-Shape slimline neck is as fast as you are. The medium jumbo frets are shiny, professionally crowned & leveled by hand. Classic looking guitar! The guitar comes made out of a thick flame maple cap (NOT a veneer!) and mahogany body. The neck is also a mahogany set neck. It also has a dark brown rosewood fret board. Specs Body: Maple flametop and mahogany body, cream binding, polyurethane clear finish Neck: 24.75” scale, D-Shape profile neck, 1 11/16” nut, polyurethane clear finish Fretboard: Dark rosewood, medium jumbo frets, pearloid Inlays, cream binding Headstock: Angled headstock, painted black on face, cream binding Electronics: x2 Stellar OSR humbucker pickups, 2x volume knob, 2x tone knob, 3-way toggle switch Hardware: Stoptail bridge, diecast tuners, chrome hardware MER001P-GE
Title: Stellar Mercury 001 Elite - Green Emerald Flametop, Singlecut Electric Guitar
ConditionDescription: A scratch on the back of the body as well as a dark spot in the stain on the front side of the body.  Besides that the guitar has perfect playability.
